• Tweet Shot

    You can now initialize a tweet in your favorite Twitter client when you post a shot. Enable this feature in the Twitter tab of the Preferences. Twitter.app is currently the only supported client.

  • Fixed Dribbble Bugs

    Fixed a bug that blocked shooting to Dribbble if the default tags were blank, and fixed a small bug that would enable the Dribbble button even if the username or password were blank.

  • Fixed Court Shot Bug

    Fixed a bug that could cause the screenshot to include the court view.
